H0.text: Hepatic relates to which organ of the human body. Pancreas

H1.text: Hepatic relates to which organ of the human body. Stomach

H2.text: Hepatic relates to which organ of the human body. Small Intestine

H3.text: Hepatic relates to which organ of the human body. Liver

A4.text: The liver has sometimes been described as the body's chemical factory.

A5.text: The liver is a major metabolic organ exclusively found in vertebrates.
